name: Poop Poop and Away!
description:
The game is set on a small planet where cows are the only inhabitants - well, except for the player who can throw poop at them to stun them and then kick them to the moon. If the player fails to kick the cows to the moon he will suffocate from the gases from the accumulating poop. 

___

Walking is done by W,A,S,D and sprint is enable by SHIFT. The player picks up the poop when walking over it and can throw it with the LEFT MOUSE button. To kick the cow RIGHT MOUSE button.

___

Bruno Ferreira, Hanna Ferreira, Raul Braga e Rui Couto
